resources.string: This showcase demonstrates the basic usage of library.\nSee: https://github.com/st235/ExpandableBottomBar#usage
This demo shows xml created menu. Menu file can be found at res/menu/bottom_bar.xml\nSee: https://github.com/st235/ExpandableBottomBar#xml-menu-declaration
This demo shows interoperability between Java and ExpandableBottomBar menu. All the code can be found at screens/JavaActivity.java
Demonstrates usage of ExpandableBottomBarBehavior. Allows FAB and Snackbar messages anchor to ExpandableBottomBar.\n See: https://github.com/st235/ExpandableBottomBar#coordinator-layout-support
Floating Action Button: on top of the ExpandableBottomBar
Advanced coordinator layout features like hide on scroll are demonstrated here. Behaviour usage can be found at screens/ScrollableCoordinatorLayoutActivity.kt

ExpandableBottomBar brings support of Navigation Components system. Starting from now you are able to attach bottom menu in a one line of code.\n See: https://github.com/st235/ExpandableBottomBar#navigation-components-support
Demonstrates usage and look of notification badges\n See: https://github.com/st235/ExpandableBottomBar#notification-badges
